subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: If Juan Pierre did not retreat to the warning track and did not time his leap to snatch the ball at the top of the fence in the fifth inning, Barry Bonds would have had his 714th homer.
snippet: If Juan Pierre did not retreat to the warning track and did not time his leap to snatch the ball at the top of the fence in the fifth inning, Barry Bonds would have had his 714th homer.
